name: Windows Registry Persistence COM Search Order Hijacking
description: Detects potential COM object hijacking leveraging the COM Search Order
false_positives: Some installed utilities (i.e. OneDrive) may serve new COM objects at user-level
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:(/[Hh][Kk][Cc][Rr]\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\.*/ OR /[Hh][Kk][Cc][Uu]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Ll][Ss][Ii][Dd]\\.*/) AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]32\\\([Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\)/) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*%%[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]%%\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /.*%%[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]%%\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Cc][Oo][Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Ll][Ii][Bb]64\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss][Yy][Nn][Cc][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]64\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss][Yy][Nn][Cc][Aa][Pp][Ii]64\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss][Mm][Ee][Ee][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\.[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ee][Rr]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx][Ee][Xx][Tt]64\..*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*[Tt][Mm][Oo][Pp][Ii][Ee][Pp][Ll][Gg]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Cc][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Pp][Ll][Aa][Tt][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\.*/) AND process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Ss][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Yy]\\[Nn][Vv][Mm][Dd][Ii]\.[Ii][Nn][Ff].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Cc][Oo][Mm][Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Xx][Dd][Ii][Aa][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Pp][Yy][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Aa][Mm][Dd]64\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Pp][Yy][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Nn][Ss][Ss][Dd][Xx]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\[Dd][Nn][Ss][Ss][Dd][Xx]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll]\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Xx]64\\3\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\.*/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Gg][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss][Pp][Rr][Oo][Xx][Yy]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Pp][Oo][Qq][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Pp][Ii][Ll][Oo][Tt]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh].*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:(HKCR\\CLSID\\* OR HKCU\\Software\\Classes\\CLSID\\*) AND registry.path:*\\InprocServer32\\\(Default\)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:(*%%systemroot%%\\system32\\* OR *%%systemroot%%\\SysWow64\\*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\* OR *\\FileCoAuthLib64.dll* OR *\\FileSyncShell64.dll* OR *\\FileSyncApi64.dll*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\SecurityHealthService.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\TeamsMeetingAddin\\* AND winlog.event_data.Details:*\\Microsoft.Teams.AddinLoader.dll*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Dropbox\\* AND winlog.event_data.Details:*\\DropboxExt64.*.dll*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:*TmopIEPlg.dll) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\wuauclt.exe OR C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe)) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Defender\\*) AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:*\\FileRepository\\nvmdi.inf*) OR (process.executable:*\\MicrosoftEdgeUpdateComRegisterShell64.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\WINDOWS\\SYSTEM32\\dxdiag.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(C\:\\Windows\\pyshellext.amd64.dll OR C\:\\Windows\\pyshellext.dll)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(C\:\\Windows\\system32\\dnssdX.dll OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\dnssdX.dll)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:C\:\\Windows\\system32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\3\\PrintConfig.dll) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:*C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\GamingServicesProxy.dll*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\poqexec.exe AND winlog.event_data.Details:*C\:\\Windows\\System32\\Autopilot.dll*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\system32\\SecurityHealthService.exe AND winlog.event_data.Details:*C\:\\Windows\\System32\\SecurityHealth*))))`
